name: Dreamer's Web
description:
Dreamer's Web takes rival Malean Military Recruits; Sky, of team DEPTH, and Dante of team WRAITH on a mission through dreams and time.

Sky and Dante both share a unique power that allows them to see past, present, and future events when they fall into dreams.

Their journey together begins when they both awaken from a historic military battle from their world's past. During this battle an evil essence is captured by a rival military force that still holds it to this day. Sky and his team are assigned to get it back. But its location, is possibly where it should have always been.

Can Sky, Dante and their team unravel the Dreamer's Web? Rivals become allies and the lines between dream and time collide.

Dreamer's Web has a deep storyline, 10+ Hours of Gameplay and over 25 playable characters! This game should be a hit with RPG gamers of old and new.

REQUIREMENTS

*ATTENTION. ONLY COMPATIBLE WITH WINDOWS OPERATING SYSTEM*

Minimum System Requirements / Recommended System Requirements

OS Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
CPU Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster
RAM 512 MB or more
HDD 250MB or more Free Space
Other 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
